content:
About Skeptical Labs LLC # Skeptical Labs LLC is a solo consulting practice based in Arlington, VA. We specialize in operations consulting for startups and government clients.
The company was founded on a simple principle:
Solve the most interesting problems, for the best clients, with the most talented people, to live the lives we choose, all the time.
We deliberately operate as a lean, single-member LLC. This structure allows us to focus on client work rather than managing overhead, and to take on projects that genuinely interest us.
About Will Hea # Will Hea is the founder and sole consultant at Skeptical Labs LLC.
Will has spent his career walking into operational dysfunction and building systems to fix it. His experience spans:
Startups: Controlant, Phin Security, Commonwealth Joe Government: DOJ Criminal Division, Department of Energy, Operation Warp Speed His own companies: Skeptical Consulting LLC, Skeptical Labs LLC Notable accomplishments include:
Primary U.S. point of contact for Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine monitoring under Operation Warp Speed 2016 DOJ Innovation Award for Talent Tracker Letter of Commendation from General Gustave Perna Recognition from President Biden Will holds PMP, A-CSM, CSPO, and SAFe Agilist certifications. He earned his MA and BA in International Studies from American University.
For more details, see Will’s personal site or his portfolio.
Contact # Email: will@skepticallabs.com
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/willhea
title: About

content:
Get in Touch # Email: will@skepticallabs.com

Location # Arlington, VA (Washington, DC metro area)
We work with clients nationwide and internationally. Most engagements are remote-first, with on-site work as needed.
Response Time # We typically respond within 1-2 business days.
title: Contact

content:
What We Do # We help organizations that are stuck. Whether you’ve inherited a mess, can’t get accurate data, or need to fix broken processes, we build the systems and visibility to move forward.
Operations Consulting # Problem: Your operations are chaotic. Teams are firefighting. Nobody knows what’s working.
Solution: We map your current state, identify bottlenecks, and build systems that create visibility and accountability.
Results we’ve delivered:
Reduced book close time from 2+ months to 3 business days Cut delinquent invoices from 30% to 0% Recovered $80K+ in bad debt through process improvements Data & Reporting # Problem: You have data in multiple systems but no single source of truth. Decisions are made on gut feel.
Solution: We connect your systems, build dashboards, and create the reporting infrastructure you need to make data-driven decisions.
Results we’ve delivered:
Built first accurate churn and revenue reporting for a seed-stage startup Created real-time financial dashboards replacing manual spreadsheet reconciliation Identified pricing and retention issues that were invisible before Federal Contracting # Problem: Your government project is behind schedule, over budget, or failing to deliver.
Solution: We bring private-sector agility to federal environments, navigating compliance while actually shipping.
Results we’ve delivered:
Achieved ATO approval in under 5 months on a project 12 months behind schedule Reduced attorney clearance times from 1-2 years to under 90 days (2016 DOJ Innovation Award) Managed $20M+ annual contract for Operation Warp Speed vaccine monitoring Fractional Leadership # Problem: You need experienced operations leadership but aren’t ready for a full-time hire.
Solution: We provide interim COO/Director-level support, building the foundation for your eventual full-time leader.
Typical engagements:
3-6 month engagements Part-time or project-based Focus on systems and processes that outlast our engagement How We Work # Discovery: We start by understanding your situation. No generic playbooks. Diagnosis: We identify root causes, not just symptoms. Build: We create systems, processes, and visibility. Transfer: We document everything so your team can maintain it. We optimize for results, not billable hours. Engagements are typically flat-fee or milestone-based.
Get Started # Ready to talk? Contact us to discuss your situation.
title: Services

content:
We walk into dysfunction, build systems to create data visibility, and use that data to drive decisions.
Skeptical Labs LLC is a solo consulting practice led by Will Hea, specializing in operations, process improvement, and revenue systems for startups and government clients.
